campaigns.name: Medical Aid for Children
campaigns.description: Providing medical assistance to underprivileged children in rural areas.

campaigns.name: Education for All
campaigns.description: Building schools and providing educational materials for children in need.

campaigns.name: Flood Relief Fund
campaigns.description: Helping communities affected by recent floods with essential supplies and rebuilding efforts.

campaigns.name: Food for Families
campaigns.description: Distributing food packages to low-income families to fight hunger.

campaigns.name: Clean Water Project
campaigns.description: Building wells and providing clean water to communities in need.

campaigns.name: Hunger Free Drive
campaigns.description: Distributing meals and ration packs to homeless families and underprivileged communities to fight hunger and malnutrition.
